TelegramAuth-desc: Extends the PluggableAuth extension to provide authentication using Telegram.
TelegramAuth-pluggable-auth-class-desc: Sets the class that should be used for Pluggable Auth
TelegramAuth-pluggable-auth-extra-login-: An array of extra fields to be added to the login form at Special:UserLogin
TelegramAuth-pluggable-auth-button-label: Sets the button text for Pluggable Auth
